AI Description: KneadData is a tool designed to perform quality control on metagenomic and metatranscriptomic sequencing data, specifically targeted at removing contaminating host sequences and improving the data quality for downstream analysis.
Core Features: Quality Control For Metagenomic & Metatranscriptomic Data, Removal Of Contaminating Host Sequences, Improvement Of Data Quality For Downstream Analysis, Support For Various Sequencing Platforms, Customizable Parameters For Quality Filtering
